name: QUATRO (Sad_Gandalf)
description:
This is my spin on the Ancient/Royal Game of UR. It includes some card game mechanics and some modern recruiting/deck builder mechanics. 

start the game, and host a match or join an existing.

Currently working on improving the looks and adding new mechanics. Any testing and feedback would be amazing, though it would take 2 to tango. 

If there is enough interest I will add the following features: -AI to play offline -Ranking System -Achievement System -New Minions/Abilities -Custom Player Name Plates -Classic UR mode

Join Discord to find matches, report bugs & just to hang out!  https://discord.gg/7arerU9tUE

If you're here from REDDIT say HI!
